column1: Winter has the new ball, and he goes full on leg stump, going down the leg side. Wayward from the left-arm seamer
back of a length, outside off. Guided to deep point
fullish, on middle. Defended off the front foot
good length, on the leg stump. Clipped to midwicket
edged over the slip cordon! Fullish on off, Hales backs away, and tries to play a drive. Sliced behind for four
fullish on off, and driven towards cover
width offered, back of a length, and he makes room to slap a cut over point. Protection in the deep though
around the wicket. Lands on middle and angles across. Tries to cut but misses
leg stump line this time, and clipped behind square for a single
good length, outside off, turn away and Khawaja uses the width to cut this to deep point. First four for Usman
yorker length, he presses forward to drive. Nearly inside-edges this onto his stumps
swept beautifully as he goes across the line and picks this full ball and deposits it behind square
full on off, and pushed to mid off for a single
length on leg stump, and gently tapped to the leg side for a quick single
length ball outside leg, he saw Khawaja backing away and cramped him for space. Tapped back to Boland
nifty! Full on off, and Khawaja runs across the stumps, turns his hips and paddles a boundary over short fine leg
tries to paddle it again by shuffling across the stumps, but this is a wider full ball. Played to deep backward square this time
good length, outside off and angling further away. Khawaja runs down the track to cut and misses. Umpire gives it a wide, a tad harsh you'd reckon
he's in the mood today! Full outside off, stands still and lofts a drive over the head of cover

the extra ball goes for another boundary as this full ball is caressed along the ground through the covers. Khawaja took a small step towards the delivery to meet it as close to his body as possible. 17 off the first Boland over
a bit lucky! Full on leg, and he wants to whip it over midwicket, but takes a thick edge and the ball flies past the keeper instead
much better from Winter. Fullish on middle and angling across Hales. Too close to his body for the late cut and he misses
one leg up, and flicked behind square! Back of a length on leg, and he uses the angle to rock back and help the ball on its way for four
slower ball, wide outside leg stump with Hales backing away. He's beaten by the lack of pace and it hits his pads. Ball rolls away to the off side
good length, on leg. Tries to whip it and he misses. Hits him on the groin region... will hurt
good length, on middle and angling away. Makes room and cuts it over point! 48 for no loss in the Powerplay for the Thunder
good length, outside off, and angling across. Misses the cut
good length on leg, and he swivels to whip it behind square. Protection there though
nice short ball on a stump to stump line. Hales ducks under it
back of a length on the fourth stump line, and Hales once again struggles to connect with his cut
good length, just outside off. Backs away and glances a cut to third man
back of a length outside leg stump. Flicked to fine leg...and a tidy over that brings the run-rate down signficantly
fullish on off, and the googly goes away from Usman. Play and miss
full, and a square drive through the infield! Races away to cover for a boundary
leading edge and falls short of point. Full on middle, and Khawaja tries to flick the googly leg side. Ball goes the other direction though
full on middle, but Khawaja shuffles across, closes the bat's face fine and paddles it to fine leg
good length on middle, and skids into Hales. Goes deep and defends towards midwicket. They scamper across for one with Sandeep giving the ball a chase

an otherwise tidy over barring the excellent boundary from Khawaja. This was full on leg stump, and he misses the flick. Keeper appeals for caught behind but not given. Probably a feather touch off the hips
full toss, outside leg stump and Hales is surprised. Tries to pull, but mistimes to short fine leg
tossed up, too much infact. Another full toss, this time on middle, and drilled back to the bowler. Goes down as a dropped chance since Short stuck his left hand out, but it didn't stick
fullish, on middle. Driven back
holes out! Full on middle, and Hales tries to slog against the turn. Toe-ends the shot, and deep midwkcket takes a simple reverse-cup catch. End of a 59-run stand
back of a length, on off. Backs away and pulls into the deep on the leg side. Winter in the deep dives forward but the ball lands just in front of him
driven! Full on off, and he hamers a drive through the covers. Ellis at deep extra cover dives to stop the boundary, and has hurt himself a little in that effort
full outside off, and driven with the turn to long off
full on middle, and he makes room before clubbing a drive off the googly to long off
tossed up on off, and the googly turns into Ferguson. Defended with soft hands

tossed up again, on off, and he looks to clear long on by going for a bit shot. But Ferguson mistimes, and the fielder in the deep takes a catch near his face right near the boundary line. Back leg not touching the rope...so Ferguson falls for just 1. Two quick wickets for the Hurricanes now, both to spin
full on leg, and worked to square leg. Big gap there allows them to take the second run
fullish on leg stump. And turning into middle. Punched towards cover
good length on middle, and turning away. Mistimes the flat-batted shot to cover
back of a length on the stumps, and he cuts with the turn to deep point
full on middle, and driven to long on
fullish, on off and turning away. Too close to his body for the cut. Misses
full on off, and turning away with Billings looking to work it leg side. Just past his outside edge

classical wristspinner's wicket! Tossed up on middle, and turning away. Billings looks to flick against the turn, and the leading edge goes straight back to Short. He's got safe hands...and this is a third wicket for spinners.
good length, outside off and angling across. Sticks his bat out to guide it fine but can't connect
short ball but not menacing. Pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
length ball on the fourth stump line, but the ball holds it's line after pitching. Rocks back to defend, but the bat is way inside the ball's line. Nowhere near the ball
full, on off, and he looks to defend with the straight bat. Outside edge along the ground, past point, to third man
fullish, on middle. Clipped to square leg off the back foot
full on off. Stands tall and hammers it past the non-striker, but intercepted by mid off
pushed past Short for a single
good length on off, and turning into Ross. Clipped to square leg

big appeal, and given! Full on middle, and he's down on one knee to slog leg side. But he misses, and it hits his back leg right in front of middle. This would've crashed into the stumps. A wicket soon after the break...we see it so often
length ball on off, and turning in. Pushed back to Short
back of a length on middle. He's cramped for space, but manages to flat-bat a shot over the bowler's head for two
full on middle, and turning away. Tries to drive, but a thick edge takes it to point instead
full on off, and he drives with the googly turn to long on
full on leg stump, and he reverse sweeps to third man
good length, on off and turning in. Defended off the back foot
good length on off, and turning in. Defended towards the off side
full, on off, and swept square to the fielder positioned in the deep
full and quite wide outside off. Nair shovels a drive over the infield, and David at deep extra cover intercepts near the boundary
length ball on off, and cut to point
yorker outside leg stump. He makes room and driven to long on
length ball outside off. He stands tall to cut, but hit in front of square. Stopped by short cover
full outside off, and it skids through. Ross presses forward to defend and it takes an edge, but the keeper can't hold on to it. Missed chance!
clears wide long on! Short tosses it up after the previous delivery's chance, and this time he takes a big stride - making some room too - before depositing it for half a dozen
quicker ball, outside leg stump, and Ross misses the sweep. Hits the keeper's pads and rolls away...
slower in the air. Length on middle, and worked to midwicket. Excellent spell from Short - 3/26
good length on middle and turning into his stumps. Nudged behind square
length ball outside off and sharp turn into Nair. Cut to point, big gap there allows Nair to take the second run
full on leg, and he wants to drive straight, but he misses, and the ball goes between Nair's legs. McDermott can't hold on, and they steal a bye
faster ball, like a medium pacer. Length on off and seaming into leg stump. Worked off his hips to square leg
full just outside off, and driven to cover point
ruins an otherwise excellent spell with that four. Full outside off, and hammered down the ground, over the umpire's head for four. Nonetheless, Lamichane concedes less than six per over in his spell
back of a length on leg stump. Ross makes room, backs away, and cuts such a way that it dissects both fielders behind square on the off side.
full, on off stump. Defended towards the off side and Ross says 'no' for the single
back of a length on middle. Swivels and mistimes a pull to square leg
full on middle and leg. Driven to mid off for a quick single

run out? for what it's worth that's an excellent effort from Ellis. Defended off the back foot and they try to run a quick single, but Ellis runs forward, picks up with one hand, and then does an underhand throw while diving forward, which hits the stumps at the batsman's end! Nair isn't even waiting
full on leg, and flicked behind square to fine leg
back of a length, on leg, and pulled to fine leg
back of a length, a cutter from Winter. Lands on middle, and angles across. Wants to guide it late to third man but doesn't get bat on ball
good length on middle. Bunted off the back foot to mid off
yorker length, on leg stump. Cutting makes room and toe-ends a drive to cover
back of a length, wide outside off, and cut to deep extra cover. Two more to the total
length ball that's flicked to fine leg
full and wide, and toe ends a slap to cover
full, wide outside off, and Cutting wants to hammer it out of the ground but mistimes to mid on instead
back of a length outside off, and cut to point. Fielder's dive stops a boundary
low full toss on middle, and thumped to midwicket. Had four written all over it, only if it beat the infielder though
gloved over short fine leg! Short ball, and Cutting swings at it. Enough to go over the infield
full and wide, and Cutting frees his arms to clobber a sliced drive over point. Protection in the deep though
Boland around the wicket, full outside off, and he clears his front leg before clobbering a six over the vacant long on region!
whippage! Full on leg stump, and Ross uses his wrists to time a flick beautifully behind square. Futile drive from deep backward square leg
yorker length, just outside off stump. Tries to swing leg side but the ball goes under his bat
slower ball, back of a length on middle. Drags a pull to deep midwicket
low full toss, on his toes, and flicked behind square! Deep backward square leg can't cut it off. Big over so far and one ball to go
massive over! Full ball outside leg, and Cutting makes room before creaming a drive to long off! Nineteen off that over
full outside off stump. Ross shuffles across to try and ramp it. Places it to short fine leg
good length, just outside off. Swings leg side, and it rolls away to deep midwicket
slower ball, just outside off. Ross swings it hard, but finds wide long on
yorker length, just outside off. Dug out
full on middle, and he swings leg side, has enough power for a four to deep midwicket
massive! Into the stands. Full, in the slot on off, and he baseball swings that over long on!
slower ball from around the wicket. Back of a length on leg and some extra bounce to the keeper as the batsman misses the leg side slog
full on off. Front leg out of the way and absolutely deposited fifteen rows back at wide long on
back of a length, on middle. Swings leg side and misses. Another slow-ish delivery
slower ball again, back of a length outside leg. Ross tries to duck and hook but misses. Bold from the umpire not to give it a wide
gives Cutting the strike for the last ball. Short ball, slow, and dragged to midwicket
back of a length on middle and angling across.. Cutting drags it to deep midwicket and they take two. Sydney Thunder finish on 5 for 167
back of a length, spinning in towards off stump, gets on the back foot to work it through square leg
tossed up, fairly wide of off, and that simply offers Short the room to free his arms and loft it into the vacant wide long-off region. Stops short of the boundary, though
back of a length on middle and off, gets on the back foot to tuck it to the right of midwicket
flat, slanting into the pads, clipped to backward square leg
flat, angling into the stumps, worked to the left of mid-on
makes a lot of room and Nair offers even more with a shortish ball outside off. Flat-batted over extra-cover, into the vast open spaces beyond
short, just a bit of width, slanting away from off stump, and he stands tall and cracks it away to the left of the diving short third man fielder
short, even wider, but the extra bounce beats Short's attempted cut
back of a length on off stump, stabbed to the right of short cover
length ball on off stump, lets it come on and steers towards deep point with an open face
again short and slanting across into a wide channel outside off. Too wide to connect with the cut
back of a length on leg stump, rides the bounce and clips towards mid-on
back of a length on leg stump, clipped to midwicket
back of a length on off and angling into him. Some extra bounce and McDermott brings his bat near his chest to defend
full on off, and he drives with the straight bat. Nearly carries to the diving mid-on fielder, but once it beats him that's four. Difficult diving catch but could definitely have taken it
good length, outside off. Punched to deep extra cover
good length just outside off. Too close to his body for the cut though. Through to the keeper
full on middle. He drives to the leg side, and stopped by midwicket
good length, just outside off. Angling across and he misses the swing
good length outside off from over the wicket. Turning in, and flat-batted to mid off
good length outside off again. Turning in, and punched past cover. Big area there near deep extra cover allows them to take the third run with ease
around the wicket. Length ball on leg stump, and he makes room before bunting it back towards the bowler
good length, angling in. Misses the flick. Hits his front pad and lobs leg side
shottt! Full on leg, and he walks inside the line before slogging a whippy shot over fine leg
good length on off. Makes room to clear his arms, and cuts in front of square for four!
extra pace does the trick! Short ball, gets onto Short a bit early, and he's late on the pull. Hits the top half of the bat and simple catch for midwicket running to his right
good length on leg stump. Angling across, and tries to guide it late to third man but hit onto his bad
full outside leg stump. Misses the flick, and it hits his boot. Rolls away to square leg

back of a length, outside off. Swivels and pulls it over the fielder at deep backward square leg! Could've been a catch in the deep but had just about enough to beat Ross, who was slightly inside the boundary rope. Could've been out had Ross stayed on the line instead of charging in. A bit of a 50-50

slow finger of death! And that's a second wicket in the over for Nathan. Full on middle, nips back a bit, and he misses the leg-side flick. Hits his back leg, and the umpire agrees with the appeal from the bowler
full on off, and he paddles it fine past Billings' right. The keeper nearly anticipated that shot perfectly and Malan could've been caught out had he timed his movement just a little better
worked to the leg side
full on leg. Nudged off his boot to square leg
worked away to the leg side off the front foot
full outside off, and he presses forward to defend towards cover
full on middle. Flicked to square leg. Seven off Sangha's first over
length ball, turning away. Cut in front of square
good length on off and turning away. Cut to deep point
good length outside off and turning into him. Makes room and slices a short behind point
good length outside off, in fact too wide and turning away. Malan mistimes the cut to deep extra cover
good length outside off. Punched off the back foot, past the diving bowler, but stopped at long on. Carrom ball there
full on middle. Flicked to square leg for a single
good length ish, on middle. Guided to point
good length ball on the fourth stump line. He waits for the ball to get to him before helping it on its way to third man

did that hit the helmet? It was a slower delivery though. Short on middle and Malan took his eyes off it trying to pull. They walk across for one but the docs are checking up on Malan now. Only 121kph
good legnth ball on off. Nudged gently to midwicket for a single
good length, outside off. Cut to deep point
good length, wide outside off. Cut to deep point
fullish outside off. Turning away, and a square drive to the deep
good length, outside off. Cut to the fielder in the deep
full on the stumps, and the reverse sweep finds point
yorker length, just outside off. Squirts a drive to the man in the deep
full on middle. Driven to long on
stopped at point! Good length, on off. Cut to point
what the 'Canes needed! And Hales is a bit sloppy there. Full on middle, and he tonks against the turn to Hales at long on. He dives to stop it, but it hits his hand and rolls over for four
good length, on off. Comes down the wicket and cuts to deep point
There's Bash Boost point for the Hurricanes! Reverse swept, from outside leg stump, and the ball runs away to the third-man fence
full on middle. Pushed to midwicket for a single
full on off. Presses forward to block, but it takes an edge and rolls to the leg side. Allows them to take a single as we go into drinks
full outside off, and caressed to deep extra cover
full outside off. Angling away, and he uses that to drive to deep extra cover
edged over the keeper! Short ball, goes for the pull, and takes a lucky top edge for a boundary
good length on off. Swivels and pulls this - on purpose - to the midwicket fence for four. Big gap there
back of a length, wide outside off. Drags a pull from outside the stumps to deep midwicket
back of a length on off. He stands tall and drills a pull to deep midwicket. Twelve off that over
full on middle. Crunched to cover
good length, on off. Makes room and cuts it fine. But intercepted by short third man
good length, on off. Turning into him and cut to deep point
yorked! Bowls it at the base of middle and leg, and Malan can't dig it out. Over 100kph, and the world's No. 1 T20I batsman has been dismissed
good length, on off, slower through the air. Punched to long on
good length outside off and turning in. Struck back to Green
good length outside off and angling across the batsman. Tries to punch off the back foot but the ball whizzes past his outside edge
full toss, quite wide, and slapped to deep extra cover
full outside off. Brings his bat down to drive and adjusts last moment to drill it towards deep midwkcket instead
back of a length on leg stump. Nudged off his hips to square leg
back of a length, on middle, hurries Handscomb to pull. He hits it straight back to McAndrew because he was slow to play it. Well stopped by the bowler on his followthrough
good length, top of off, and slapped to the gap near deep point. Calls early for the second run
good length, outside off. Stands tall and cuts to deep point

the youngster gets the big wicket of the Hurricanes captain! Full outside off, turning away, Handscomb comes down the ground and he can't connect. Billings collects and whips the bails off in a flash. Sangha is now tied-first for most wickets this season
good length, outside off. Cuts off the back foot to point. Gets off the mark in a flash
good length, wide outside off. Hammered past the non-striker for four! Dissects both long on and long off
good length wide outside off and turning further away. Left alone
full on the stumps, and worked leg side
half-tracker, googly, and struck towards cover
good length on off, and he pulls along the ground to deep midwicket
good length, on off. Close to his body, but cuts away. To deep point
straight to cover! Half-tracker on off, and he looks to cut. Slapped hard, but taken by the fielder! This was a low-ish catch, but Ferguson's got safe hands
full on middle, and caressed to long on
good length on middle. Stands tall and thumps a pull to wide long on
full on leg, and turning further down. Nudged to short fine leg
nudged to short fine leg
punches this length ball to long on
good length, outside off, and he slaps a shot to deep point. Shouts of 'catch it' but to no avail
full on off, and he defends to midwicket. Misfield allows them to take the single
full outside leg, and an opportunity to get four is missed. Swept well, but Nair dived and stopped it at short fine leg

Sangha is now the leading wicket taker, outright! Last ball of his spell, goes full and very wide. Ingram goes for a dragged slog, and it takes a tiny edge that Billings grabs. Would've been a wide had Sangha left it
good length, on middle. Makes room and punches to wide long off
back of a length, on off. Pulled along the ground to deep backward square
fullish, on off. Bunted to mid off
length ball on off. Pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
you miss, I hit! The X-Factor doesn't do much. Full and straight, and Wright misses the big shot. Rattles the stumps
full on off. Dug back to Milne, who then throws it back towards the stumps at the batsman's end!
yorker on off, and sliced to cover for a single
overpitched on middle. Winter looks to drive to mid on, but the ball hits his front boot, and the lbw appeal is given by the umpire.
good length outside leg stump. Misses the flick, hits his pad but no lbw because its pitched outside
yorker on off, no contact
drilled to mid off
inside edges a slog to the leg side. Only six runs in the Power Surge
yorker dug away
good length, outside off, and muscled to cover
back of a length on off. Misses the pull
slaps this length ball to the off side
good length ball, on off. Mistimed back to Milne
yorker length, on middle. Defended. Milne's spell - 1/25
back of a length, quite wide outside off. No shot offered
good length, outside off, and he mistimes a swipe to the leg side. Under-edged towards the keeper
mere formality though as Ellis pumps a leg-side swipe between long on and deep midwicket
short ball, searing pace. Whizzes past Ellis' ears
full and wide, but inside the tramlines. Misses the attempted drive
yorker length, on leg, and dug down the ground to long on
last ball is a wide, although that was inside the tramlines. Maybe because Boland backed away
back of a length, on middle. And goes over his head. No ball given because he's bowled an extra short ball. Free hit to end the match
finally...game over. Yorker outside leg stump and Boland misses. Sydney Thunder win by 39 runs and move to first!
